long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Wiz offers you the flexibility to change the names of your browser tabs at your convenience. 

Ever found yourself lost among a sea of opened tabs, unsure of its precise content? Our handy tool addresses this exact issue, serving the purpose of helping you better organize and understand your browser pages.

You get to name the tabs as per your personal preference or need, enhancing your browsing experience by increasing efficiency and conveniently picking out the necessary tabs. It's as simple as that, a seamless journey towards clearer, more efficient browsing sessions.

Install Tab Wiz, and let's embark on this journey to clarity and high efficiency today.
long.zh_CN:
标签精灵提供灵活的方式，可以根据你的需要随时更改浏览器标签页的名称。

是否曾经在打开的数十个标签页中迷失方向，无法确定每个标签的具体内容？标签精灵就是为了解决这个问题，帮助你更好地组织和理解浏览器页面。

你可以按照个人的喜好或需要给标签页命名，从而提高浏览的效率，并便捷地找到需要的标签。就是这么简单，让我们一起向更清晰、更高效的浏览体验迈进！
